title: Crossing Into The Emperor’s Body At Night - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Gender Bender   Historical   Romance   Shoujo
tags: Average-looking Protagonist   Betrayal   Body Swap   Easy Going Life   Female Protagonist   Transformation Ability   Transmigration
author: 花心者
description:
Fang Shu has a secret. Every night, she crosses into the body of the emperor, who is aloof, and distant like a deity.

But she is timid. At most she eats some delicious food while borrowing his identity. For half a year, she makes no mistake.

One day, the emperor finds himself fat.>
